mapper.select: select acc_name, acc_idx, acc_type,acc_img, acc_text, region_name from ( select row_number() over(order by cnt desc) AS RNO, b.acc_name, b.acc_idx, acc_type,acc_img, acc_text, region_name, cnt from acc_tag g JOIN acc_tbl b on g.acc_idx = b.acc_idx JOIN area_tbl r on r.region_code = b.state ) V where RNO between 1 and 3 order by cnt desc
